settings.title: System Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure platform-wide preferences and policies
settings.defaultLanguageDesc: Sets the default language for new users and system messages
settings.mediumManualReview: Medium - Manual review for medium+ severity
settings.highManualReview: High - Manual review for all reports
settings.autoEscalationDesc: Automatically notify higher authorities for high-severity hazards
settings.emailNotificationsDesc: Send email alerts to officials for new reports
settings.smsAlertsDesc: Send SMS for critical incidents (charges may apply)
settings.socialMediaIntegrationDesc: Monitor and pull hazard reports from social media platforms
settings.automaticBackupsDesc: Daily automated backups of all reports and user data
settings.dataRetentionDesc: Number of days to retain archived/discarded reports
settings.maxReportsDesc: Prevent spam by limiting daily report submissions per user
settings.resetAllSettingsDesc: This will restore all system settings to factory defaults
settings.clearAnalyticsDataDesc: Permanently delete all aggregated analytics and statistics
